de.cdauth.osm.basic
Class API

java.lang.Object
  de.cdauth.osm.basic.API

public class API
extends java.lang.Object

Provides static methods to communicate with the OSM API. Handles the HTTP connection and parses XML responses.

Constructor Summary
API()

setUserAgent

public static void setUserAgent(java.lang.String a_userAgent)
Sets the User-Agent HTTP request header for all future API requests.

Parameters:
a_userAgent -

fetch

public static org.w3c.dom.Element fetch(java.lang.String a_url,
                                        java.lang.String a_server,
                                        int a_port,
                                        java.lang.String a_prefix)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        APIError,
                                        org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
Makes a HTTP request to the API and returns the XML root element of the response.

Parameters:
a_url - The URL to be appended to the API prefix, for example "/node/1"
a_server - The API hostname, for example "api.openstreetmap.org"
a_port - The API port, usually 80.
a_prefix - The API prefix, for example "/api/0.6"
Returns:
The root DOM Element of the XML response.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - There was an error communicating with the API server.
APIError - The HTTP response code was not 200 or the XML response did not contain a root element.
org.xml.sax.SAXException - The XML response could not be parsed.
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - There was a problem while initialising the XML parser.

makeObjects

public static java.util.ArrayList<Object> makeObjects(org.w3c.dom.Element a_root)
Makes OSM objects out of an XML element containing <node>, <way> and <relation> elements.

Parameters:
a_root - The root element. Way.cache() and Relation.cache() methods. You should use this when you aren’t working with old versions of objects.
Returns:
An ArrayList of OSM Objects. They can be cast to the sub-types by checking Object.getDOM().getTagName().

get

public static Object[] get(java.lang.String a_url)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                           javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                           APIError
Fetches OSM objects from the given API URL.

Parameters:
a_url - For example "/node/1"
Returns:
An array of OSM Objects. They can be cast to the sub-types checking the Object.getDOM().getTagName() value.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
org.xml.sax.SAXException
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
APIError

Joins the values of an array using a specified delimiter.

Parameters:

The resulting string.
